original_text: So Solomon sat on the throne of his father David, and his rule was firmly established.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 그의 아버지 다윗의 왕위에 앉으니 그의 나라가 심히 견고하니라

sentences.original_text: So Solomon sat on the throne of his father David
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 솔로몬은 그의 아버지 다윗의 왕좌에 앉았고

sentences.original_text: and his rule was firmly established
